Package gw.api.iso

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IISOReceipt  
    IISOReply  
    IISOSend
    Interface for sending a request to ISO
    ISOConstants
    Constants used when generating ISO XML.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ISOCodeList
    Code lists used in ISO requests.
    ISOCoverageCodes
    Represents an ISO PolicyType/CoverageType/LossType combination
    ISOEditableRequest
    Allows modification of the XML in an ISORequest after the initial XML generation is complete.
    ISOMessageLogger
    Used to log XML messages to a specified directory.
    ISOPayloadGenerator Deprecated
    use the new Gosu ISO payload generation infrastructure, also in the gw.api.iso package, but based around ISOClaimSearchRequestBase and ISOLossSectionBase.
    ISOProperties
    Configurable properties used when generating ISO requests or receiving ISO responses
    ISORequestId
    Represents the id of a request to ISO.
    ISOTestUtils
    Utility class for ISO testing
    ISOTranslate
    Utility class for translating ClaimCenter items, such as dates and typecodes, into a form acceptable in an ISO ClaimSearch request
    XPNode
    The XPNode class wraps a DOM and allows XPath retrieval operations to be performed on that DOM.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ISOServerMockReplies
    Represents the different replies that can be returned by the ISO Server Mock
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ISOBadReceiptException
    Exception thrown if the synchronous acknowledgment (AK) from ISO cannot be processed.
    ISOBadReplyException
    Exception thrown if the asynchronous response (RSP) from ISO cannot be processed.
    ISOBadRequestException
    Class description...
    ISOCommunicationException
    Exception thrown if there is an error communicating with ISO
    MessageAndHistoryUnavailableException
    Represents an error condition where a message ID is no longer available in the system.
